effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.gold_silver: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.crystal: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Throws coins. Gets them back later.
flavor_text.crystal: Throws coins. Gets them back later.
